item.title: Master HTML with Visual Studio Code | Beginner's Guide
item.description:
In this beginner's guide, we'll explore how to use Visual Studio Code to write and edit HTML code. We'll start by learning the basics of HTML, and work our way up to more advanced topics. By the end, you'll have all the skills you need to start building your own websites with Visual Studio Code!
We'll being by showing you the vscode extensions that Mark uses to work efficiently in Visual Studio Code. We'll then create our first HTML page, using visual studio. Well then go through the foundations of HTML as you learn the language and how to use the excellent VS Code development environment.

media:content.media:tags: chat gpt,open ai,software development,software engineering,chatgpt python,chatgpt python api,chat gpt python,coding with chatgpt,coding with chatgpt python,coding with chatgpt,coding with chatbot,learn coding with chat gpt,how to code with chatgpt,chat gpt code,chat gpt code generator,chat gpt coding tips

item.title: Learn To Code in 16 Minutes
item.description: Have you ever wanted to try coding? Or maybe you've wanted to learn, but didn't know where to start. You'll Learn To Code in 16 minutes with Python in this video. In this exciting 16-minute video, you're invited to code along with Mark as he teaches you the foundations of coding using Python. Mark will start and show you how to access Python on your machine, and how to set up your text editor. Then you'll write your first code-- the Hello World program with Python. You'll execute your code using the command line-- which is how true programmers do it! As you continue to learn to code, Mark will review variables. You'll create a string variable and an integer variable and display the values of those variables within your command line. Next, it's on to conditional statements-- which is how Python programs make decisions. You'll also learn how to take command line input in Python. Mark will wrap up the video with a demonstration of loops-- another important primary coding structure. While this isn't the only video you should watch on coding, it IS the first one you should watch. Have fun learning the foundations of coding in just 16 minutes.

Well-designed forms will allow users to easily convert-- meaning submit their information, make a purchase, or sign up for a mailing list. Poorly designed forms will cause users to abandon the page. In this video from our HTML5 Full Course for Beginners series, you'll learn to create text-based forms in which the user can enter information.
